name: Aura Ambit: Homecoming
description:
There is no 'sixth sense'.

What the Uninitiated consider a ‘sixth’ sense, is really one of the five that is preternaturally focused, allowing interaction and exposure to the paranormal. There are people out in the world with a cardinal sense that kept growing, evolving. Reaching towards the Otherside.

These are people with a Sense.

Seeing ghosts isn’t a gift, and Caddie Armont avoids them as much as possible. But when violent ghost activity spikes with homecoming just around the corner, Caddie decides to align herself with international paranormal investigators James Lockette and Miguel Orfeo to settle the score. With her best friend Raleigh by her side and the Spectres breathing down her neck, Caddie must give the case everything she’s got if she wants to save her school...and make it through the week.

The only way out is in.

Aura Ambit: Homecoming is a visual novel adaptation of the ghost-investigation horror webtoon Aura Ambit. A demo is currently available, and a full version is coming soon!
